q:
Suppose you have used onActivityResult method for connecting two activities using intents. In that, you have to sent result from Child to Parent using RESULT custom values. While printing the result in the execution of app, your parent activity got the result with RESULT_CANCELED value.
Which of the following option could be the correct reason for this value?

Options

  1. Child activity is failed due to crashing
  2. Child activity doesn't extend the fragment class
  3. Child activity should have inbuilt libraries like google maven
  4. Parent activity doesn't have intent library

You want to declare a new activity with the name "SampleActivity". This should be declared in the Manifest file for configuration. Find the correct code snippet for achieving the desired result.

Options

1.

<manifest ... >
  <application ... >
      <activity name="SampleActivity" />
      ...
  </application ... >
  ...
</manifest >

2.

<manifest ... >
  <application ... >
      <activity android=".SampleActivity" />
      ...
  </application ... >
  ...
</manifest >

3.

<manifest ... >
  <application ... >
      <activity android:name=".SampleActivity" />
      ...
  </application ... >
  ...
</manifest >

4.

<manifest ... >
  <application ... >
      <activity android:title=".SampleActivity" />
      ...
  </application ... >
  ...
</manifest >
